ROW.NAME: 税管员
ROW.SQLWHE: deptid like (select decode(scope,'ALL','%',substr('[%SYS_DEPTID]',0,7 )||'%') from v_depts where id='[%SYS_DEPTID]') order by name

ROW.DATDSC: select flag,rownum rn, (select name from v_swjg sw where sw.id=substr(swjg_dm,0,7)) swjg, nvl(shxydm,id) id,name,addr,lawman,taxman from ( select '' flag,b.swjg_dm,b.shxydm,a.id,max(b.name) name, max(b.addr) addr,max(b.lawman) lawman,max(c.name) taxman from tax_taxdata a,tax_company b,v_tax_taxman c ,tax_cmpammno d where a.id=b.id and b.id=d.cmid(+) and d.ammno is null and b.taxman=c.id(+) and b.taxman like '%[%TAXMAN]%' and b.typclsid like '[%TYPCLSID]%' [%TAXMANSTR] [%SWJGSTR] [%FLGSTR] and (a.id like '[%CMID]%' or b.name like '%[%CMID]%' or b.shxydm like '[%CMID]%') group by b.swjg_dm,a.id,b.shxydm order by b.swjg_dm,a.id,b.shxydm )
select name from tax_company where id like '[%CORPID]'
select fxjb from FXJK_ITEM where flbh='0005'
